comment.author: 35837445@N08
comment._content: People certainly knew how to dress for an occasion then - lovely photo

comment.author: 51729007@N02
comment._content:
These gowns are stunning! I especially love the two on the far right :) It's a shame most deb balls these days don't have as much individuality and elegance.

According to the Powerhouse Museum's database the photo was taken on the 26 April 1938, and 'the Settlement is a non-profitable charitable organisation that was established by the Women's College at the University of Sydney to assist with the needs of the disadvantaged.'
